column2: Take Imperial Exam

The Imperial Exam - or the Esadian - is the most prestigious test in all of antedivulian America. As a [Root.Government.GetName] ruler, it is your right and duty to have yourself certified by a Evaluator of Merit.
Has not already applied
Needs a retest
Was expelled for cheating
Has an available Evaluator of Merit or Guru
Abdicate as [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]

As a [Root.Government.GetName] ruler, failing your Imperial Exam is a major blow to both your prestige and legitimacy. Although you are under no obligation to renounce the throne, it may be what is best for the realm.
Reschedule Imperial Exam
For one reason or another, the evaluators have yet to come back to you. At this point, it's easier to cut your losses and reschedule.
Claim Liege Realm
Your liege has done poorly on their Imperial Exam. As a ruler who has passed, you have a right to claim your lord's realm and replace them.
Appoint Governatus

The Governatus of California is a very important and influential title within the Imperial Court of California and across the entire realm. A person who holds this title may be able to garner enough support to displace the emperor, so one must be careful of who they pick.
Sanction Anti-Governatus
With the Governatus seizing more and more power for themselves, it is necessary to declare an "anti-Governatus" to combat this unjust power grab.
Remove Governatus

Your Governatus of California has begun to drift off course from your vision, and now is sometimes at direct odds with your decisions. As the Celestial Emperor, you have all the right to remove the governatus at your will.
Imperial Authority is at least 65%
Remove Anti-Governatus
Although the anti-Governatus you have chosen was supposed to defer to your rule, they have began to stray from Imperial perview. It would be best to rescind your endorsement.
Remove Governatus

The current Governatus of California has begun to drift off course from your vision, and now is even at direct odds with your decisions. As the Celestial Emperor, you have all the right to remove the governatus at your will.
Imperial Authority is at least 65%
Appoint Governatus Heir
Although the appointing of a governatus is usually reserved for the Celestial Emperor, your elevated position in the Imperial Court grants you the leverage to choose your own heir.
Request to be Governatus Heir
Although you are a fine candidate for governatus, the current titleholder has not appointed you their heir. To correct this grave mistake, it is best to confront the governatus directly.
Has not asked for five years.
Slander [Root.GetCeticTitle]

The sensibilities of the Californian nobility mandate that allegations of improper behavior must be taken with the utmost seriousness. Although there is a possibility of getting caught in a lie, pulling it off can lead an improvement in stature among the Imperial Court.
Has not attempted to change Imperial Authority for two years
Has not attempted to change Imperial Authority for seven years
Distribute Grain in Imperial Capital

The will of the people is influential in the politics of the Imperial Court, and so, controlling it is vital to controlling the empire. By feeding the many starving peasants of the capital, one may be able to gain favor among the populace, and cement their influence over the Imperial Court.
Distribute Grain in Emperor's Name

As a loyal subject of the emperor, I must bow to his will. However, I currently have more sway over the Imperial Court than he has. If I distribute grain in his name, it may turn the tides towards him instead.
Defer Powers to Emperor
As the emperor's loyal subject, I must bow to his will. However, at the current moment, I have more power over the Imperial Court. By surrendering powers to him, I can tip the balance of power.
Gain Favor of [Root.GetJobTitle]
Influence over the Imperial Court requires the favor of the ones who are a part of it. By gaining a councilor as an ally, one can further cement control over the council.
Perform a Bureaucratic Inspection

One of the many duties of the [From.GetCeticTitle] is to ensure that the many bureaucratic realms are running smoothly. Although this power has fallen out of use in recent years, the resurgence in bureaucratic norms necessitates inspections once again.
Has not conducted an inspection in two years.
Has not been inspected for five years.
Reform Bureaucracy
The bureaucracy of my realm is not up to par, to say the least. By pouring gold into reform efforts, however, I may be able to turn the situation around.
Has not attempted to reform the bureaucracy for ten years.
Sell Bureaucratic Positions

As a Bureaucratic ruler, there are many positions within the realm that I have the right to fill. Although they are supposed to be meritorious, I can use these positions to make a profit, at the expense of my bureaucratic system.
Has not sold any positions for seven years.
Construct a Bureaucratic Structure

In order to properly function, a bureaucracy requires things such as local offices and a road system. Currently, our realm lacks both, and as a bureaucratic ruler, it's my duty to foster a well-running bureaucracy.
Is not currently building anything.

I have just received an application to take the Imperial Exam from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. As the Evaluator of Merit for [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], it is my duty to either accept or deny each application.
This application is fine enough.
What even is this? [From.GetTitledFirstName] is totally unprepared!
I have just finished reading your application to take the Imperial Exam, and I have found it to be up to my standards. Please come to the Examination Center within the next month.
Excellent.

I have just finished reading your application to take the Imperial Exam, and I regret to inform your that it is not up to the high standards of the Imperial Exam. You are welcome to write another application at any time, granted that you are prepared.
Disappointing...
Now that I am set to take the Imperial Exam, I need to get myself prepared through rigorous study. I can start by choosing which subject I am to focus on.
Math - numbers seem to elude me when I'm dealing with the realm.
Language Arts - I am unable to read a book without slipping off.
Science - I cannot grasp all the calculations and long-winded essays.
History - Reading about the old and gone bores me so.
Now that I know what I am to focus on, I can now plan out how much time I will study.
Reading a few passages before bed will do enough for me.
I shall take to the book instead of to the hunt.
Take your studies serious, though you may get strained.
Every free second I have must be used to put my nose in a book!
Drown yourself in studies. A noble goal, however it might put unnecessary strain on your body and mind.
I have finally finished my studies. Now I am ready to take the Exam.
...I hope.
The Examination Center

You arrive at the massive examination center, where [Root.Government.GetName] lords from all walks of life come to receive their certification. You enter, are greeted by the Evaluator of Merit, and are given a test packet and a place to sit.
Let me leave with the smile of a coyote, and not one of a lark.
Math Section
You open to the first section and see the equations pile up as you start to flip ahead. The numbers jump out at you like a cougar.
Lets hope I remember the formula to this one...
Your skills will determine how many points you receive.
I think I wrote some equations inside my hanfu.
Attempt to cheat to get a passing grade this section. This is a very high risk move.
getting caught cheating
slipping past the eyes of the evaluators
Language Arts
You finally finish the Math portion, and get to Language Arts. Eyeing the syntax, grammar, and general style, it's obvious this was written by a Sacramentan.
Valleyan Grammars, don't fail me now!
I believe I still have some lose notes in my garments.
Science
You get to the Science section of the Exam, and you skim over all the questions. Some of these terms you could have sworn to be names in a fantasy novel you read.
I just need to get my head straight and see past the confusion.
Do I still have that theorem sheet in my inside pocket?
History
That Science part is now behind you, and you get to the History portion of the Exam. Regnal numbers, proper names, and events meet your eyes.
Any proud Cetic knows the history of Cali...er...
I think I have a summary of Californian history in my... ahem.
Bureaucracy

Your days of recalling histories are over, at least for now. You have reached the final - and most difficult - section of the Imperial Exam, the Bureaucratic Treatise. You must now write an essay on the laws governing the realm. At least you get to choose the specific subject.
I am the ruler of this realm, I should know this! Do I know this?
Maybe I can take some "inspiration" from a paper I read.
One of the evaluators in the room glanced over to your table and caught you red-handed. They has asked you to leave the premises, and has failed you.
Very disappointing...
I am not one to take no for an answer.
Attempt to bribe the test taker into passing you.

As I write the last few words in my treatise, anxiety washes over me. One of the evaluators takes my Exam and informs me that it will take a few days for them to get back to me with my score. I am almost unable to wait that long.
It will be finished in due time.
I have received the exam of [From.GetTitledFirstName], and now must go through and score it.
[From.GetSheHeCap] has passed.
[From.GetSheHeCap] has failed.
Imperial Exam Rank

I have just received a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], congratulating me for passing the Imperial Exam with a score of [Root.test_score.GetValue], and officially granting me a rank, according to my score.
I am now officially certified to rule my lands!

I have just received a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], informing me that I did not pass the Imperial Exam as a I received a score of [Root.test_score.GetValue]. [From.GetSheHe] went on to state that I may retake the Exam, though at a fee.
I knew I should have studied longer!
Maybe some gold will sway [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent a letter, requesting that I pass his Exam paper, along with a considerable amount of gold.
The sound of the coins is too alluring.
I simply cannot sacrifice my integrity to make [From.GetHerHim] happy!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has accepted my bribe and passed my Exam.
Excellent.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to pass my Exam, though has decided to keep my "donation".
Damn it!
As a [Root.Government.GetName] ruler, I must pass the Imperial Exam to have legitimacy among both vassals and peers.
Hopefully I can pass, and pass soon.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] informs me that [From.GetSheHe] has abdicated his throne to [From.GetHerHis] heir, due to [From.GetHerHis] failure to pass the Imperial Exam.
Hopefully the next ruler can actually pass the exams.
Now that I am no longer a bureaucrat, it makes little sense for me to be chained to the Imperial Exam system.
No loss to me!
An Appointment by the Emperor
[From.GetHerHisCap] Imperial Majesty's messanger has given me a letter informing my appointment as the Governatus
I shall serve my emperor with pride!

As the Governatus of California, the emperor tasks me with running some parts of the realm that [Root.GetSheHe] simply cannot attend to. Although a regent has been appointed by [Root.GetHerHisCap] Majesty, I must ensure that the realm is run by a trusted member of the court - me.
The emperor can trust me...
Send a message to the ex-regent of California, informing him of his reassignment.
Governatus [From.GetFullName] has informed me that I have been "reassigned", and now HE is the regent of California!
That damn governatus!
As my authority as emperor begins to wane, and the Governatus takes control of imperial duties, I have nothing left to do except shut myself in my estate.
I hope I am better at painting than administrating...
With the Imperial Council ever so slightly now in your favor, you no longer are forced into confinement in the palace.
At least some of my shackles are off...
As my authority as emperor begins to wane, and the Governatus takes control of imperial duties, my decrees and wishes have been taken to heart by nearly none of the Imperial Court.
I am beginning to feel trapped...
With a silver tongue and quick mind, I have taken back much of the control and influence Governatuss of the past have unduly stolen from emperors.
May this be a permanent change.
As my reign goes on and my authority over my court begins to fade, I can sense myself becoming less influential among my vassals.
Soon I will regain influence...
Through bureaucratic skill, rigorous work, and a couple of... underhanded moves, I have full control of California!
May this be the case evermore!
After achieving victory over your opponents, your control over the Imperial Court has improved.
Excellent
As a skilled bureaucrat, your vassals are more inclined to follow your lead over the Governatus.
With a high Imperial Exam, your reign as emperor has been fully legitimized.
California Reunited!

The great bear has wrestled control of the empire from his devious vassals, and has reasserted [Root.GetHerHis] dominance over all of California! May my reign be bright, and may my heirs surpass me in its brilliance.
After releasing my inspiring teachings, I have noticed that I have more sway over my court than before.
After releasing my new teachings, I have noticed that I have more sway over my court than before.
After suffering a defeat by your opponents, your control over the Imperial Court has weakened.
Disappointing...
As a poor bureaucrat, your vassals are less likely to follow your lead.
By failing the Imperial Exam, you have revealed yourself to be unfit for the tasks normally assigned to an emperor.
Without the support of the peasantry, the influence of your reign has weakened
As ruler unproven to the Imperial Court, the influence of the emperor has lessened.
As your regency drags on, your regent has been gaining more and more influence at the expense of yours.
With your terrible treatise on Cetic theology being released upon the faithful to their horror, your influence among them as dipped.
The current Governatus of California has chosen me to the his heir to the governatus title!
The governatus has informed you that he has chosen someone else to be his heir, and that he is formally rescinding his endorsement.
He'll be back...
My late [GetFromRelation] did not leave any will designating an heir to [From.GetHerHis] title of governatus. As a close relative of [From.GetBestName], I have a claim to governatus.
I shall do all that I can to carry out [From.GetHerHis] wishes.
My liege did not leave any will designating an heir to [From.GetHerHis] title of governatus. As the legal heir of [From.GetBestName], I have a claim to governatus.
Governatus [From.GetFullName] has just passed away, and in accordance to his will, I have inherited the position of governatus.
Hasta la vista, friend...
[From.GetBestName] has passed away, leaving me with no heir to my title of governatus...
As my direct liege is now the Celestial Emperor, it is appropriate for me to take my place on the council in my role as governatus.
One must get behind someone before stabbing them in the back...
As the new Emperor of California, it makes little sense to be both governatus and emperor.
I reluctantly give up my post.
The emperor has informed he has no use for my services, and that he is formally removing me from the position of governatus.
I guess I'm terminated...
I might as well mess the place up on the way out.
Pen a scathing review on the emperor addressed to the council.
[slanderee.GetRandomSlanderDescCetic] All that I can now do is pen a compelling narrative and hope the council is respondant to my message.
I'll show the [slanderee.GetCeticTitle] who's boss!
For the next few nights, you will furiously write down all that you have learned into what hopefully will be an eye-opening testimony.
Your supposed masterpiece fails to sway the council.
The council is taken in by your piece
The council believes every single word you wrote
My letter to the council has gone poorly to say the least. I was barely able to finish it before they heckled me into silence. Sufficed to say, I did not sway them at all.
Maybe it was a bad idea...
The Imperial Council's opinion of you has worsened.
According to a court ally, the Imperial Council took my warnings seriously, and their view of the [slanderee.GetCeticTitle] has soured.
I knew that my comment about [slanderee.GetHerHim] being [slanderee.GetInsultAdjective] got them!
The Imperial Council's opinion of [slanderee.GetCeticTitle] [slanderee.GetFullName] has worsened.

Extremely confident in the information I have, I went directly to the council to make my case. After somewhat nervously presenting the evidence that the [slanderee.GetCeticTitle] is [slanderee.GetInsultAdjective], the council looked aghast. It seems as if they have taken my concerns to heart.
It's a relief to see I have influence over the Council.

As the Imperial Council began its meeting, a letter from [From.GetBestName] was brought before us. As it was read aloud, I could not believe what I was hearing. It seems as if [From.GetSheHe] is attempting to baselessly slander the [slanderee.GetCeticTitle]!
The absolute nerve!
Opinion of [From.GetBestName] has soured among the council

During the opening of a new session of the Imperial Council, a messanger delivered a letter from [From.GetBestName]. During its reading, everyone in the room began to look more and more shocked. The letter contained allegations that the [slanderee.GetCeticTitle] is [slanderee.GetInsultAdjective] and unfit to rule, and it contains evidence to back its claim up.
I am in utter shock...
Opinion of [slanderee.GetBestName] has soured among the council

The meeting of the Imperial Council opened in a very unorthodox way with [From.GetBestName] reading a report detailing transgressions of the [slanderee.GetCeticTitle]. [From.GetSheHe] calls the [slanderee.GetCeticTitle] [slanderee.GetInsultAdjective], and that [slanderee.GetSheHe] is unfit for office. After [From.GetSheHe] finished, I looked around and saw that the other councilors had the same astonished face that I had.
The [slanderee.GetCeticTitle] is a scourge upon California!
The council's opinion of the [slanderee.GetCeticTitle] has taken a considerable dip...

One of my councilors have informed me that [From.GetBestName] saw fit to slander me after I fired [From.GetHerHim], and sent a letter to my council implicating me in multiple uncivilized deeds. It seems as if the council did not believe him, as the letter ends with a declaration of support for me and against [From.GetBestName].
Seems as if I got the last laugh!

As I entered the Imperial Court and saw my council, I could notice something was off. After receiving some piercing glares, one of my loyal retainers informed me that [From.GetCeticTitle] [From.GetBestName] has brought charges against my character, and the council believes it.
How could they accept such drivel!

As I walked into the court, my entire council storms me, asking me to answer for various charges against me, after recovering from the shock, I simply told them I had no idea what they were refering to, and moved along. It was only until later that I learned that this was orchestrated by [From.GetBestName], probably to get revenge for him being fired.
I am not [slanderee.GetInsultAdjective]... am I?

The masses of California are easily swayed with bread and circuses, and the adoration of the populace is necessary for a [Root.GetCeticTitle] to wield power decisively. By delivering grain to the people of the Imperial Capital, I can gain more leverage over the Court.
Peasants can make do with what I can give.
Have your workers distribute excess crops to the people
I will give all I can, within my budget.
Have your workers distribute crops to the people
I shall spare no expense for the people of California!
Have your workers distribute an... expensive amount crops to the people

My charitable donation of food to the people of the Imperial Capital has seemingly been in vain. According to my messangers, the food I have given to the peasantry was of a poor quality, and now [Root.CeticWheatponsibility]

My donation of food to the populace of the Capital has been a great success! According to my messangers, the peasantry have been hailing my name, which tips the balance of power away from the [Root.GetCeticTitleOpp] towards myself.

In order to gain leverage within the Imperial Court, I have decided to attempt to gain the support of [swayee.GetJobTitle] [swayee.GetFullName]. Hopefully, [swayee.GetSheHe] will understand my noble cause. Now, how shall I go about this?
My charisma should be enough
Some gold shall sway [swayee.GetHerHim]
I could use some... underhanded leverage
§Y[swayee.GetJobTitle] [swayee.GetFullName]§ not being swayed to your side.
§Y[swayee.GetJobTitle] [swayee.GetFullName]§ not swayed to your side.
Dear [swayer.GetTitledFirstName],\n\n[swayer.CeticSway]
Dear [swayer.GetTitledFirstName],\n\nYou have thoroughly convinced me to take your side against the tyranny of the [swayer.GetCeticTitleOpp]. You may consider me a close ally and friend!
The Celestial Emperor has informed he that he has lost confidence in his current governatus, and that he is authorizing me to invade for the title.
I have won against the previous governatus! Now, to decide my future move...
The emperor's word is law, I shall follow their word.
I have no need for that fool's word!

The masses of California are easily swayed with bread and circuses, and the adoration of the populace is necessary for an emperor to wield power decisively. By delivering grain to the people of the Imperial Capital, I can give the emperor more leverage over the Court.

My donation of food to the populace of the Capital has been a great success! According to my messangers, the peasantry have been hailing the emperor's name, which tips the balance of power away from myself and towards him.
After penning an order giving certain powers back the emperor, it seems as if things have shifted, with the emperor's word having more sway over councilors than before.
I hope His Celestial Majesty is pleased with my gesture.
[From.GetCeticTitle] [From.GetFullName] has ordered some of the authorities alloted to him be transfered to me instead, shifting the balance of power.
Seems as if [From.GetSheHe] is loyal after all!
I have received word that my chosen Governatus has just won his war against the pretender!
I have received word that my chosen Governatus has just lost his war against the pretender
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has requested that [From.GetSheHe] should be my heir as governatus.
I see no reason not to!
[From.GetFirstName] is just power hungry
To my friend [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\n\nSince I came to power, I have been waiting for a perfect heir, and one has just shown up! I know formally appoint you as the heir to the governatus.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],\n\nAfter mulling over your request, I have come to the conclusion that you are not qualified to be a governatus once I pass.
With the reconquest of a bureaucratic kingdom, my influence throughout court has risen greatly.
I have received a report that the [Root.GetCeticTitleOpp] has attempted to undermine me in my capacity as [Root.GetCeticTitle]! However, [From.GetSheHe] has failed in [From.GetHerHis] endeavor.
That snake!
I have received a report that the [Root.GetCeticTitleOpp] has successfully undermined me in my capacity as [Root.GetCeticTitle]!
As a new Bureaucratic ruler, I am subject to the rules and traditions of Californian Bureaucracy.
Through nothing but my bureaucratic skill, my peers have heralded me as an example to be followed, and many of my vassals have taken their word.

Reports of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s bureaucratic skill has reached my palace. [From.GetSheHe] has been used as an example of a model bureaucrat, which has brought much positive attention to my court.
By granting my council more power, the bureaucracy of my realm has become more efficient.
As a skilled [Root.GetJobTitle], my abilities are utilized within [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. As a result, the bureaucracy of [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has become more efficient.
[From.GetBestName]'s skills in [From.GetHerHis] capacity as [From.GetJobTitle] are unparalleled. Through [From.GetHerHis] diligent service, the realm's bureaucracy has become more efficient.
Armed with an entourage of bureaucratic inspectors, I must now take the next week or so to inspect the entirety of [inspectee.GetBestName]'s realm.
I must leave no stone unturned!
After performing a rigorous inspection, [inspectee.GetBestName]'s realm seems to be in line with bureaucratic standards.
Hopefully [inspectee.GetHerHis] vassals are the same...
After performing a rigorous inspection, [inspectee.GetBestName]'s realm seems to have gone above and beyond bureaucratic norms.
After performing a rigorous inspection, [inspectee.GetBestName]'s realm has failed to meet the bureaucratic expectations, and so I cannot pass [inspectee.GetHerHim].
Because of my... less than stellar bureaucratic skills, my peers claim that I am unfit to hold any title, and that I have harmed the bureaucracy of my realm.

Reports of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s lack of qualifications have reached my palace. [From.GetSheHeCap] is used as an example of poor bureaucratic management, which is a blow to both of our realms...
By having a weakened council, the bureaucracy of my realm has been lacking...

[From.GetBestName]'s skills in [From.GetHerHis] capacity as [From.GetJobTitle] are lacking, to say the least. If [From.GetSheHe] is not bumbling through council meetings, then they are making the bureaucracy of my realm inefficient.
[From.GetBestName] has informed me that [From.GetSheHe] will take steps towards having a more efficient realm bureaucracy.
[From.GetBestName] has informed me that [From.GetSheHe] will not attempt to improve their realm bureaucracy.
As the new ruler of this realm, some of the bureaucratic standards have slipped during the transition.
I hope I can reinstate those bureaucratic norms...

After years of paying little attention to my realm's bureaucracy, it has come to my attention that many local bureaucrats have been taking advantage of my lax oversight, with embezzlement and lethargy being rampant among them.
Maybe I should look into fixing this...
After years of bureaucratic degradation, my previously highly functioning realm has slipped somewhat.
I must improve this situation immediately!
Through hard work both on the parts of my vassals and myself, my realm's administration has never been more streamlined.
After a series of administrative reforms, my realm's bureaucracy has become the envy of all others, with diplomats flocking to the capital to inquire about my techniques.
It just takes harmony and rightful deeds!
After consulting with advisors about how to best improve my realm's bureaucracy, all I need to do is create a budget for this plan.
The plan is great already, it doesn't need much.
The results of your reforms will be apparent in six months
Allot the project a small budget
Any plan needs a good budget to go allow with it.
Grant the plan a fair budget
I must give as much as possible!
Pump a lot of gold into reforms.
My reforms have not done well, to say the least. It seems as if nothing meaningful has changed, and all the money I poured into the project has disappeared.

After six months, my reforms have made a noticeable impact on my realm. Many of the corrupt bureaucrats have been reformed, and some of the administrative clutter has been lessened. There is still a lot of work to be done, however.
This is a good first step.

Due to my reforms, the realm's bureaucracy has changed greatly. The corruption, redundancies, and red tape have, for the most part, been cleared out, and as a result, many things run smoother. Although there is a lot of work to be done, this is a great first step.
Excellent!

Although conquests have brought my realm countless treasures, the increased size has caused my bureaucrats many headaches. Messages cannot be sent to and from the capital as easily as before, causing a drop in administrative efficiency.
If only we had steel wagons...
Average Bureaucratic Efficiency is capped at 70%
Realm Bureaucratic Effeciency is capped at 75%
With a project in mind, I now have to pick what to construct.
My bureaucrats need a place to work.
Build offices in your capital, increasing your realm's bureaucratic efficiency.
My realm needs to be interconnected.
Build roads in your capital, increasing average bureaucratic efficiency.

With the offices finished and the bureaucrats settled, I am filled with immense pride in the work that I have done. My the administration of the realm has been made way more easier with my project completed.

With the roads finished and seas of carts being pulled across it daily, I am filled with immense pride in the work that I have done. My the administration of the realm has been made way more easier with my project completed.
§YImperial Authority§! will §Bincrease§! by 1%
§YImperial Authority§! will §Bincrease§! by 2%
§YImperial Authority§! will §Bincrease§! by 3%
§YImperial Authority§! will §Bincrease§! by 5%
§YImperial Authority§! will §Bincrease§! by 7%
§YImperial Authority§! will §Bincrease§! by 10%
§YImperial Authority§! will §Bincrease§! by 20%
§YImperial Authority§! will §Rdecrease§! by 3%
§YImperial Authority§! will §Rdecrease§! by 5%
§YImperial Authority§! will §Rdecrease§! by 10%

§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 1.5%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 2%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 3%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 4%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Rdecrease§! by 0.25%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Rdecrease§! by 0.5%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Rdecrease§! by 1%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Rdecrease§! by 3%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Rdecrease§! by 5%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Rdecrease§! by 7%
§YRealm Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Rdecrease§! by 10%
§YAverage Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 0.10%
§YAverage Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 0.20%
§YAverage Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 0.25%
§YAverage Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 0.5%
§YAverage Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 1%
§YAverage Bureaucratic Efficiency§! will §Bincrease§! by 2%

As the new Emperor of California, you now must heed to the many standards and customs of the realm, including the necessity to defend Imperial Authority
How did the Lawgiver deal with this?
Imperial Authority ([Root.global_imp_auth.GetValue]%)

The authority of the emperor is determined by how much control over bureaucratic California they has. As it ebbs and flows, so does the power of the emperor.
Imperial authority can be §Bincreased§! by:
§Y*§! Having high stewardship or learning
§Y*§! Uniting California
§Y*§! Influential imperial writings
§Y*§! Direct action by the emperor
Imperial authority can be §Rdecreased§! by:
§Y*§! Having low stewardship or learning
§Y*§! Revolts
§Y*§! Succession
§Y*§! Long regencies
§Y*§! Bad imperial writings
§Y*§! Direct action by the Governatus
Realm Bureaucratic Efficiency ([From.PrimaryTitle.bureau_number.GetValue]%) \ Average Bureaucratic Efficiency ([global_bureau_number.GetValue]%)

The bureaucracy of a realm is determined by how much bureaucratic norms are prevalent in said realm. As it changes, the norms of the realm change with it.
Realm bureaucracy can be §Bincreased§! by:
§Y*§! Having qualified lords
§Y*§! Having a powerful or qualified council
§Y*§! Bureaucratic reforms
§Y*§! Direct action by the emperor or Governatus
Realm bureaucracy can be §Rdecreased§! by:
§Y*§! Having unqualified lords
§Y*§! Having a weak or unqualified council
§Y*§! Succession
§Y*§! Direct action by the emperor or Governatus
Inefficient Bureaucracy
Due to poor recordkeeping, inefficient administrative systems, and corrupt bureaucrats, this realm's bureaucracy is in disarray.
Efficient Bureaucracy
This realm's administrative positions are full of hardworking bureaucrats, making it the envy of nations.
Poor Reforms
This character's attempt to reform their realm has gone poorly.
Effective Reforms
The reform attempts of this character have been a success.
Sold Bureaucratic Positions
This character has sold bureaucratic positions, a sign of corruption in their realm.
Bureaucratic Offices
This province contains offices for bureaucrats, increasing the efficiency of the realm
Road Network Center
This province is the center of a realm-wide road network, fostering better bureaucracies accross the realm.
Unevaluated
This bureaucrat has not been evaluated by an Evaluator of Merit or Guru, and is not seen as legitimate by vassals and peers.
Failed Exam
This character has failed their Imperial Exam, a grave blow to their legitimacy.
Mallard
This bureaucrat has passed the Imperial Exam, and has earned the first rank - Mallard.
Great Egret
This bureaucrat has passed the Imperial Exam, and has earned the second rank - Great Egret.
Valley Quail
This bureaucrat has passed the Imperial Exam, and has earned the third rank - Valley Quail.
Bald Eagle
This bureaucrat has passed the Imperial Exam, and has earned the fourth and highest rank - Bald Eagle.
Weak Emperor

Imperial authority has been extremely limited, with the emperor being restricted the to Imperial Palace. It will take skillful political and theological maneuvering to remove the legal and cultural restrictions currently in place. Despite the military restrictions, the favor of the Imperial Court is a powerful diplomatic tool.
Emperor of California

The authority of the emperor is relatively high and stable, with all its typical duties and powers. Although [Root.GetHerHisCap] Majesty is in power within the Imperial Court, and particulary skillful politician may be able to wrestle control from the hands of the sovereign.
Strong Emperor

The authority of the emperor is high and seemingly stable. Vassals of all rank and power bow before the glory of the emperor, and [Root.GetSheHe] wields considerable power, within the walls of the Court and without. It would take a political mastermind and an emperor of... low quality for this sort of control to be taken away.
Governatus

The Governatus of California is a very influential title among the Imperial Court and all throughout California. As the highest ranking official within the Imperial Court, surpassing even the kings and queens of the bureaucratic realms, the Governatus has the ear of the emperor at all times.
Anti-Governatus
The Celestial Emperor of California has lost confidence in his Governatus, therefore, he has selected [Root.GetTitledFirstName] as his Anti-Governatus
Governatus Heir
The Heir of the Governatus does not wield any special privileges, however what it lacks in power, it makes up in prestige. Although, in due time, one will gain both power in prestige.

Governatus

The Governatus of the Empire of California is a very influential title among the Imperial Court and all throughout California. As the highest ranking official within the Imperial Court, surpassing even the kings and queens of the bureaucratic realms, the Governatus has the ear of the emperor at all times.

Bureaucratic War Declaration
These laws govern if the ruler is or is not allowed to wage war.
Allowed Declaration
Bureaucratic lords are under no obligation to refrain from waging war.
War
Disallowed Declaration

Bureaucratic Ruler
I must find a way to keep these rioting peasants in control, and fast.
the emperor has forced me to pay for new deliveries of food to be given to the peasants.
Your honeyed words and empty promises shall not sway me! You and your deceitful silver tongue will never gain my support.
The bribe you sent with your letter greatly offends me. You will not gain my support in your corrupt operation.
Not even the lowest attacks can dissuade you from being a low character. No man of such moral emptiness can call me a friend.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a insufferable, weak-willed [slanderee.GetManWoman], without any worthy accomplishment to [slanderee.GetHerHis] name. It would be nothing more than my duty to make sure everyone knows of how pathetic [slanderee.GetSheHe] is.

It should not be hard to smear [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName], given the abominable crime already staining [slanderee.GetHerHis] name. It will be all too easy to condemn a Kinslayer such as [slanderee.GetHerHim].

The Church has already condemned [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] to eternal damnation by excommunicating [slanderee.GetHerHim]. It is time somebody reminded [slanderee.GetHerHim] that heretics of [slanderee.GetHerHis] kind have no place left in society.

I have it on good authority that [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is less of a man. I should make sure that this shameful mutilation [slanderee.GetSheHe] is afflicted by is something neither [slanderee.GetSheHe] nor [slanderee.GetHerHis] subjects ever risk forgetting.

There are many rumors about the vile, blasphemous experiments [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] carries out in the secrecy of [slanderee.GetHerHis] laboratory. It would be only right for me to denounce [slanderee.GetHerHis] witchcraft.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a licentious man with no self-control, always running after any sweet face he lays eyes on. Surely, denouncing his dissolute behavior will earn me his hatred, as well as smear his reputation.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a licentious woman with no self-control and a long list of lovers. Surely, denouncing her dissolute behavior will earn me her hatred, as well as smear her reputation.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] has already the bad reputation of a weaselly, conniving [slanderee.GetManWoman]. It should not be hard for me to further smear [slanderee.GetHerHis] name by pointing out [slanderee.GetHerHis] lack of honesty.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] already has the reputation of a cruel, sadistic monster. It should be easy for me to build upon [slanderee.GetHerHis] devious tendencies to further smear [slanderee.GetHerHis] name and earn [slanderee.GetHerHis] contempt.
[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName]'s excesses are already known throughout the realm... Yet, maybe the people need a reminder of how lavish and depraved [slanderee.GetHerHis] feasts really are...

I think it should always be good form to remind a bastard of [slanderee.GetHerHis] proper place in [Root.Culture.GetName] society every once in a while. I am sure [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] will appreciate my thoughtfulness in this regard.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] has been turned into a limping cripple, yet [slanderee.GetSheHe] still thinks that [slanderee.GetSheHe] deserves any dignity? Maybe I should make it clear to [slanderee.GetHerHim] of how pathetic [slanderee.GetHerHis] state is.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName]'s mind is already vanishing. It is time somebody made it clear to [slanderee.GetHerHim] that a [slanderee.GetManWoman] with [slanderee.GetHerHis] mental deficiencies has no place in proper society.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a shell of a [slanderee.GetManWoman], barely strong enough to stand on [slanderee.GetHerHis] own. Who could ever respect such a pitiful creature? I should make sure everybody knows how pathetic [slanderee.GetSheHe] is.

Who could ever take [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] seriously? The [slanderee.GetManWoman] is so fat I doubt [slanderee.GetSheHe] would be able to ride a horse. It won't hurt me to remind [slanderee.GetHerHim] and [slanderee.GetHerHis] court of how pitiful [slanderee.GetHerHis] state is.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is already a sobbing wreck with little love for [slanderee.GetHerHis] own life. I am certain that, with the right words, I will be able to push [slanderee.GetHerHim] over the edge.
[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing but a pathetic drunk. I should just denounce [slanderee.GetHerHim] publicly and wait for the justly-earned praise of my peers.
[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing but a stark-raving lunatic. I should just denounce [slanderee.GetHerHim] publicly and wait for the justly-earned praise of my peers.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing but a cursed maniac, [slanderee.GetHerHis] skull a hollow cove for demons. I should just denounce [slanderee.GetHerHim] publicly and wait for the justly-earned praise of my peers.

How can [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] stand to look at [slanderee.GetHerselfHimself] in the mirror, I wonder? If [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] struck [slanderee.GetHerHim] with such a grotesque and repulsive face, it is only so that good people could make fun of it.
It is well enough time that somebody exposed [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName]'s supposed chastity for what it really is - a poor attempt to hide the [slanderee.GetManWoman]'s impotence.
It is well enough time that somebody exposed [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName]'s supposed chastity for what it really is - a poor attempt to hide the [slanderee.GetManWoman]'s barren womb.

Why is [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] so mindful of what [slanderee.GetSheHe] eats? Is [slanderee.GetHerHis] constitution so weak that [slanderee.GetSheHe] can only withstand the blandest of foods, or is [slanderee.GetSheHe] so afraid to be poisoned that [slanderee.GetSheHe]'d rather starve [slanderee.GetHerselfHimself]? I should share my doubts with everyone.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a hopeless squanderer. It is baffling to me how anybody would entrust anything of value to such a [slanderee.GetManWoman]. Warning other people about [slanderee.GetHerHis] damnable habit would be nothing more than my duty.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is always doing something, always working... Clearly [slanderee.GetSheHe] doesn't trust [slanderee.GetHerHis] own friends and family to handle even the simplest of tasks. I should make sure that everybody knows of [slanderee.GetHerHis] disconcerting pettiness.

Some of [slanderee.GetHerHis] sycophants would claim that [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a very patient [slanderee.GetManWoman], but how could [slanderee.GetHerHis] quiet and condescending demeanor hide anything but cowardice? I must make sure that everyone knows the true nature of this wicked person.

Some of [slanderee.GetHerHis] sycophants would claim that [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a very kind [slanderee.GetManWoman], but how could [slanderee.GetHerHis] quiet and condescending demeanor hide anything but cowardice? I must make sure that everyone knows the true nature of this wicked person.

Some of [slanderee.GetHerHis] sycophants would claim that [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a very humble [slanderee.GetManWoman], but how could [slanderee.GetHerHis] quiet and self-deprecating attitude hide anything but cowardice? I must make sure that everyone knows the true nature of this wicked person.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is clearly a slave to [slanderee.GetHerHis] own passion. It is only a matter of time before [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] rots [slanderee.GetHerHis] lustful limbs away. I should warn the people around [slanderee.GetHerHim] before [slanderee.GetSheHe] drags somebody else into perdition.
[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is obsessed with food. Such self-indulgence should not go unpunished. It is only right that I condemn [slanderee.GetHerHis] behavior publicly.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName]'s heart is consumed by greed. A person so petty and materialistic has no place in civilized society. I should make my disdain for [slanderee.GetHerHim] clear to everyone.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is an indolent, pathetic creature, unwilling to perform the simplest task or take the smallest responsibility. I should denounce [slanderee.GetHerHis] slothful attitude so that all can see it.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a wrathful, frothing madman, unable to listen to reason or accept any dissent, no matter how justified. I should denounce [slanderee.GetHerHis] quick-tempered attitude so that all can see it.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a petty, wicked-minded [slanderee.GetManWoman], filled with hatred and self-loathing. As much as [slanderee.GetSheHe] tries to hide [slanderee.GetHerHis] deviousness, [slanderee.GetHerHis] true nature is all too apparent to me. It would be nothing more than my duty to make sure everyone knows of how rotten [slanderee.GetSheHe] is.

Would it be so wrong to let everyone remember once more what a pretentious, entitled [slanderee.GetManWoman] [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is? [slanderee.GetHerHisCap] ego could certainly use a bit of resizing...

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] has no concern for anyone but [slanderee.GetHerselfHimself], happily trampling other people on the road of [slanderee.GetHerHis] success. [slanderee.GetHerHisCap] friends and family should be made wary of [slanderee.GetHerHis] selfish, uncaring soul.
[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName]'s inconstant nature is entirely unfitting of any grown [slanderee.GetManWoman]. It is only right that I condemn [slanderee.GetHerHis] behavior publicly.

It is not enough for [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] to be careless [slanderee.GetHerselfHimself], [slanderee.GetSheHe] needs to reprimand anybody else that shows the least amount of self-preservation. Such destructive behavior needs to be exposed and rightfully condemned.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName]'s unimaginative and uncaring attitude towards life and [slanderee.GetHerHis] responsibilities is a pathetic sight to behold. Yet some people seem to appreciate [slanderee.GetHerHis] lack of any will or ambition. I should make sure that everyone knows of [slanderee.GetHerHis] apathetic nature.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing but a coward. [slanderee.GetHerHisCap] unacceptable behavior needs to be exposed and condemned if [slanderee.GetSheHe] is ever to improve. By denouncing [slanderee.GetHerHim] I would only do [slanderee.GetHerHim] a favor.
It should not be hard to smear [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] given [slanderee.GetHerHis] cruel disposition. Everybody needs to be reminded of [slanderee.GetHerHis] ruthless attitude.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] barely conceals [slanderee.GetHerHis] blasphemous lack of faith in [slanderee.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Such a person should not be allowed to live in any proper society, [slanderee.GetSheHe] should be shunned and condemned for [slanderee.GetHerHis] heathen ways.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName]'s duplicitous nature may be a secret to [slanderee.GetHerHis] friends and family, but it is quite clear to me. I should expose [slanderee.GetHerHis] lack of honesty so that everyone knows to be wary of [slanderee.GetHerHis] forked tongue.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] spends too much time studying ancient books from strange and mysterious authors. [slanderee.GetHerHisCap] shady activities are obviously proof of [slanderee.GetHerHis] heretical beliefs. I should expose [slanderee.GetHerHis] wickedness for all to see.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] has never been able to learn the virtue of silence and discretion. [slanderee.GetSheHeCap] is constantly talking and harassing everyone around [slanderee.GetHerHim]. I should make it clear how much I despise [slanderee.GetHerHis] obnoxious attitude.

I can scarcely believe how a grown [slanderee.GetManWoman] like [slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] has yet to develop any sort of tact. [slanderee.GetHerHisCap] bluntness is unbearable, and needs to be openly mocked if [slanderee.GetSheHe] is ever to learn [slanderee.GetHerHis] lesson about manners.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] already has a reputation for a strict and uncompromising character. [slanderee.GetHerHisCap] lack of tact and understanding and blind following of rules and traditions will inevitably lead to [slanderee.GetHerHis] perdition unless somebody reproaches [slanderee.GetHerHim]...

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a twitching, paranoid fool. If [slanderee.GetSheHe] is unable to trust even [slanderee.GetHerHis] closest friends and family, how can [slanderee.GetSheHe] properly be part of civilized society? Surely, [slanderee.GetSheHe] must be shunned away from it.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a timid, spineless recluse. If [slanderee.GetSheHe] is unable to be open even [slanderee.GetHerHis] closest friends and family, how can [slanderee.GetSheHe] properly be part of civilized society? Surely, [slanderee.GetSheHe] must be shunned away from it.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] has such a dull and forgettable personality, devoid of any spark of imagination, that I am surprised there is anybody willing to spend any amount of time listening to [slanderee.GetHerHim]. Perhaps I should bring more light upon [slanderee.GetHerHis] lack of intellect...

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing but a gullible fool, ready to believe anything that [slanderee.GetHerHis] sycophants tell [slanderee.GetHerHim]. Such a careless person should never have any meaningful place in civilized society, at least not if I have anything to say about it.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing more than a fanatic, unable to see reason or consider any moderate opinion when it comes to matters of faith. People like [slanderee.GetHerHim] should be shouting from street corners amongst the peasants, they do not belong in a court.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is nothing more than a deformed freak, yet [slanderee.GetSheHe] still thinks that [slanderee.GetSheHe] deserves any dignity? Maybe I should make it clear to [slanderee.GetHerHim] how pathetic [slanderee.GetHerHis] state is.

[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] and I might share the same blood, but we have always been of very different minds. I could never stand the sight of my [GetslandereeRelation], and I think it's time I reminded [slanderee.GetHerHim] of the reasons why once more.
[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is an infidel, worshiping false idols and forsaking the word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. What more is needed to disparage [slanderee.GetHerHim]?
[slanderee.GetTitledFirstName] is a heretic, perverting the worship of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] with twisted, unholy rituals. What more is needed to disparage [slanderee.GetHerHim]?
